channel.title: CVE Feed for themeum -- Tutor LMS – Migration Tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themeum -- Tutor LMS – Migration Tool

item.title: CVE-2024-1804|2024-07-28T13:20:03.518Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms%20%E2%80%93%20migration%20tool
item.description: The Tutor LMS – Migration Tool plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the tutor_import_from_xml function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to import courses.
